services.title: Bathroom Remodeling
services.description: Complete bathroom remodels with expert tile installation and clean finishing
services.longDescription: Our bathroom remodeling service focuses on practical design, durable materials, and precise tile craftsmanship. From demo through final details, we build bathrooms that are clean, functional, and built to last.

benefits.title: Tile-First Craftsmanship
benefits.description: Careful layout, straight lines, and clean finishes throughout showers, floors, and accent walls.

benefits.title: Waterproofing Focus
benefits.description: Built with proper prep and moisture protection to help prevent future issues.

benefits.title: Modern Design Options
benefits.description: From marble-look tile to contemporary finishes tailored to your style.

benefits.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
benefits.description: We stand behind our work and focus on delivering a final result you are proud of.

services.title: Kitchen Remodeling
services.description: Kitchen upgrades with quality tile installation and detail-focused finishing
services.longDescription: Our kitchen remodeling services include backsplash installation, tile upgrades, and finish work that elevates both style and functionality. We prioritize clean installation and dependable craftsmanship from start to finish.

benefits.title: Backsplash & Surface Tile
benefits.description: Durable and attractive tile solutions for high-use kitchen areas.

benefits.title: Clean Installation
benefits.description: Organized jobsite practices and careful workmanship throughout the project.

benefits.title: Built for Daily Use
benefits.description: Materials and methods selected for long-term performance in busy kitchens.

benefits.title: Custom Look
benefits.description: Layout and finish options that match your home and design goals.

services.title: Custom Showers & Wet Rooms
services.description: Custom shower builds with elegant tile work and precise waterproofing
services.longDescription: We design and build custom showers and wet-room style spaces with a focus on slope, drainage, waterproofing, and high-end tile finish. Every element is installed with precision for a clean, lasting result.

benefits.title: Shower System Expertise
benefits.description: Thoughtful prep and installation details for reliable long-term performance.

benefits.title: Premium Finishes
benefits.description: Marble-look tile, modern details, and clean lines tailored to your style.

benefits.title: Code-Conscious Build
benefits.description: Installed with durable materials and methods suited for wet, high-use environments.

benefits.title: Detail-Oriented Finish
benefits.description: Careful trim, grout, and fixture transitions for a polished final look.

services.title: Maintenance & Specialty Projects
services.description: Residential and commercial maintenance, repairs, and select specialty exterior scopes
services.longDescription: Beyond remodels, we provide ongoing maintenance support and tile repair for homes and commercial properties. We also take on select specialty scopes, including exterior finishing projects that match our capabilities.

benefits.title: Commercial Maintenance
benefits.description: Reliable support for businesses that need consistent, professional maintenance service.

benefits.title: Tile Repair Services
benefits.description: Targeted repairs and updates to restore worn or damaged tile areas.

benefits.title: Specialty Scope Capability
benefits.description: Experience supporting work such as insulation, sheathing, house wrap, and Hardy board siding finish-out.

benefits.title: Proven Results
benefits.description: Consistent communication and quality-focused execution from start to completion.
